title: AE插件：变形3D网格插件套装 Mettle Plugins Bundle v1.8 (2016.03.08)
author: 大众脸
content: Mettle公司是AE的重要插件提供商，其插件数量不多但质量精良。本次发布的Mettle Plugins Bundle v1.8为变形3D网格插件套装，更新支持Adobe CC 2015，并新增全景环境贴图插件SkyBox及其他插件的优化升级。该套装适用于After Effects用户，提供丰富的3D网格变形、文字动画及VR内容制作功能。
supported_versions: After Effects CS5, CS6, CC, CC 2014, CC 2015

download_links.name: AE插件：变形3D网格插件套装 Mettle Plugins Bundle v1.8 (2016.03.08)

plugins_included: FreeForm V2.11 - 网格变形插件（普通版）
FreeForm Pro v1.8 - 3D网格变形插件（专业版）
plugin_details_en: FreeForm V2.11: 3D Mesh Warp Plug-in for After Effects. Bend, Warp and Distort a 3D layer in After Effects. Practical to create cylinders, curves, ribbons, and folds. Easy to create terrains, tunnels, animate water, character animation, and much more!

FreeForm Pro v1.8: Pro-Level 3D Mesh Warp Plug-in for After Effects. Create and animate terrains, water, billowing fabric, backgrounds in After Effects. Great for character animation, shape morphing, and much more!
ShapeShifter v1.8: Organic Text & Logo Plug-in for After Effects. Design and animate 3D logos directly in After Effects. Create backgrounds, 3D morphing shapes, and much more, all customizable.

SkyBox Creator v2.3: Script that lets you generate a 360-degree animation from your After Effects comp. It automatically places a Camera with 6 views in your comp, renders and stitches them together seamlessly.
SkyBox Extractor v1.3: Converts stitched equirectangular footage into 6 separate camera views for motion tracking, object removal, etc.
SkyBox Converter v2.3: Converts between Cubic Cross, Equirectangular and Spherical formats with camera re-orientation controls.
SkyBox Viewer v1.3: Emulates 360° viewing experience for YouTube 360, Oculus Rift, etc., useful for preview and testing.
SkyBox VR Player v1.02: Free plugin for previewing 360° content in After Effects and Premiere Pro using Oculus Rift (Windows only).
SkyBox 360 Post FX v1.0: Seamless post effects for cinematic 360°/VR production in After Effects.
other.compatibility: WIN64 After Effects CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CS6
other.installation_note: 插件为一键安装版，安装即可使用，无功能限制
